SEARCH
Package Models

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Models.Room
public class Room extends Object
Room represents a single room/cell in the game map grid. Each room has a position (x, y), optional items (pickaxe, ender pearl, question), a lever for controlling walls, and properties like entrance, center, and soul sand. Supports custom floor colors and images for visual customization.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String name, int x, int y, boolean isEntrance, boolean isCenter)
      Creates a new Room with the specified position and properties. Initializes all item fields to false and custom floor fields to null.
      Parameters:
      name - the name identifier for this room
      x - the x-coordinate of this room in the map grid
      y - the y-coordinate of this room in the map grid
      isEntrance - true if this is the game entrance room
      isCenter - true if this is the center room containing the treasure

  • Method Details

    • setSoulSand

      public void setSoulSand(boolean isSoulSand)
      Sets whether this room contains soul sand (slowing material). Soul sand makes players move slower through the room.
      Parameters:
      isSoulSand - true if this room has soul sand, false otherwise

    • isSoulSand

      public boolean isSoulSand()
      Determines whether this room contains soul sand.
      Returns:
      true if this room has soul sand, false otherwise

    • setCustomFloorColor

      public void setCustomFloorColor(Color color)
      Sets a custom floor color for this room. Setting a color clears any previously set custom floor image.
      Parameters:
      color - the Color to use for the floor, or null to clear custom color

    • getCustomFloorColor

      public Color getCustomFloorColor()
      Returns the custom floor color set for this room.
      Returns:
      the Color used for the floor, or null if no custom color is set

    • setCustomFloorImage

      public void setCustomFloorImage(BufferedImage image)
      Sets a custom floor image for this room. Setting an image clears any previously set custom floor color.
      Parameters:
      image - the BufferedImage to use for the floor, or null to clear custom image

    • getCustomFloorImage

      public BufferedImage getCustomFloorImage()
      Returns the custom floor image set for this room.
      Returns:
      the BufferedImage used for the floor, or null if no custom image is set

    • setHasPickaxe

      public void setHasPickaxe(boolean hasPickaxe)
      Sets whether this room contains a pickaxe item. Pickaxes allow players to break through breakable walls.
      Parameters:
      hasPickaxe - true if this room has a pickaxe, false otherwise

    • hasPickaxe

      public boolean hasPickaxe()
      Determines whether this room contains a pickaxe.
      Returns:
      true if this room has a pickaxe, false otherwise

    • setHasEnderPearl

      public void setHasEnderPearl(boolean hasEnderPearl)
      Sets whether this room contains an ender pearl item. Ender pearls allow players to teleport to random or specific locations.
      Parameters:
      hasEnderPearl - true if this room has an ender pearl, false otherwise

    • hasEnderPearl

      public boolean hasEnderPearl()
      Determines whether this room contains an ender pearl.
      Returns:
      true if this room has an ender pearl, false otherwise

    • setHasQuestion

      public void setHasQuestion(boolean hasQuestion)
      Sets whether this room contains a question challenge. When players enter a room with a question, they must answer correctly.
      Parameters:
      hasQuestion - true if this room has a question challenge, false otherwise

    • hasQuestion

      public boolean hasQuestion()
      Determines whether this room contains a question challenge.
      Returns:
      true if this room has a question, false otherwise

    • setLever

      public void setLever(Lever lever)
      Sets the lever associated with this room. A lever allows players to control wall connections on the map.
      Parameters:
      lever - the Lever object to associate with this room, or null to remove

    • getLever

      public Lever getLever()
      Returns the lever associated with this room.
      Returns:
      the Lever object, or null if no lever is in this room

    • hasLever

      public boolean hasLever()
      Determines whether this room contains a lever. Checks if the lever field is not null.
      Returns:
      true if this room has a lever, false otherwise

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name identifier for this room.
      Returns:
      the name of this room

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of this room in the game map.
      Returns:
      the x-coordinate position

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of this room in the game map.
      Returns:
      the y-coordinate position

    • isEntrance

      public boolean isEntrance()
      Determines whether this is the entrance room where players start.
      Returns:
      true if this room is the game entrance, false otherwise

    • isCenter

      public boolean isCenter()
      Determines whether this is the center room containing the treasure. The goal of the game is to reach this room.
      Returns:
      true if this room is the center treasure room, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this room using its name.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this room with another object for equality based on coordinates. Two rooms are equal if they have the same x and y positions in the map. This implementation checks for same object reference, null values, and type compatibility.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with this room
      Returns:
      true if the objects represent the same room position, false otherwise
